CommonCodeBlockLanguagesTips: Selected languages will be pinned at the top, separated by commas.
AdjustCodeBlockHeightTips: If the maximum height is set, the drag range will not exceed it.
DisplayCollapseExpandCodeBlockButton: Display Collapse/Expand Button for Code Block
KeywordFilterNotebooksMatchSubdocuments: Keyword Filter for Notebooks - Match Subdocuments
MiddleClickToggleDocTree: Middle-click to expand/collapse notebooks or documents
MiddleClickResizeImageWidthDesc: Units are required. Example: 200px, px: fixed width; 25%, %: viewport percentage.
ZoomWidthLoadedImagesCurrentDocument: Zoom the width of loaded images in the current document
ShowTopBatchZoomBtn: Show a batch image zoom button at the top
MiddleClickToggleProtyleTitleOrList: Ctrl + Middle-click to zoom lists in the editor
MiddleClickToggleProtyleTitleOrListDesc: Only modifies the current style temporarily; it will revert after a refresh.
